ygData.messageBody:
The classes are balanced though!!! Every class has it's purpose and the
reason necros have good pets is because they suck in groups. It's true they
can't dish damage even at high level there not that great in groups. About
all they have are their pets and a dd that has a long ass receast time and
is basically bad not to mention it's fire based which means most places it
will get resisted. The dots take over 2 minutes to use so basically I got my
pet left over and a undead nuke spell. So basically if I'm not hunting
undead I'm screwed in groups. Especially in Solusk dungeons where my best
dot and my best dd are automatically resisted. So now I'm left with a pet.
See why necros pets are so powerful now?

Naeeldar

>On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>>
>> Um who said's a pet isn't supposed to be better then another class? Did
>
>I would think that would be common sense. Why play the
>"another class" when you can play this class and have a pet
>that's better than that "another class"?
>
>Unless you don't believe the classes should be balanced (which
>is a valid viewpoint, but yet another reason I don't like
>class-based systems).
>
>> verant ever once state that? Again you can do other things to make up for
>> melee so it's not unbalancing can my pet mes? charm? mana song ? heal
song?
>> Or hell can it even think? A pet in no case is a replacement for a real
>> thinking tank not once have I ever seen somebody go no we don't want you
for
>> our group we got a necro pet or a magician pet.
>
>You'd have a point if the necro class were just the pet.
>It's not - it's the necro and the pet. No the pet can't
>charm, but you can. No the pet can't regen mana, but you can.
>No the pet can't nuke/DoT/buff, but you can. No the pet can't
>think, but you can.
>
>Like I said, if the idea of casting classees having pets that
>can melee better than or almost as well as melee classes makes
>sense, then so does the idea of melee classes having pets that
>can cast spells better than or almost as well as casting
>classes. /pet heal me, /pet nuke <target>, /pet evac us, /pet
>mes <target>, /pet buff <target>, and make them regen mana 5x
>faster than players (which is approx how fast pets heal).
>
